selection_basis: IC50=14.6nM at sigma-1R; 93% receptor occupancy confirmed by PET imaging at therapeutic doses
key_reference: Meunier et al., 2006, Br J Pharmacol

selection_basis: Highest sigma-1R affinity among all SSRIs (Ki=36nM); confirmed by human PET study; clinical trial conducted specifically for sigma-1R
key_reference: Hashimoto et al., 2009, Biol Psychiatry; TOGETHER trial 2021

selection_basis: Identified via ChEMBL quantitative binding pipeline (Ki/IC50, Phase 4, agonist/modulator filter)
